Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along a very eerie stretch of Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive runs in between the Necropolis on the north side of the road and the Estate of Natasha de Allisk on the south side. It is rumored that the Manor is still haunted by old ghosts and the previous owner of the mansion. It is also rumored that Natasha herself still roams the halls.
